src_text: Ukudlula emhlabeni kukaNgqongqoshe u-Ohm Collins Chabane IKhabhinethi izwakalisa ubuhlungu nokudabuka ngokudlula emhlabeni kungaNgqongqoshe uChabane kanye nabaqaphi bakhe, oSayitsheni Lesiba Samuel Sekele kanye noMareme Lawrence Lentsoane, abadlule emhlabeni kabuhlungu engozini yemoto enyantisayo ngeSonto mhla ziyi-15 Ndasa 2015.
trg_text: The passing of Minister Ohm Collins Chabane Cabinet is saddened by the untimely passing of Minister Chabane and his protectors, Sergeants Lesiba Samuel Sekele and Mareme Lawrence Lentsoane, who died in a tragic car crash on Sunday, 15 March 2015.

src_text: UHulumeni kanye nabantu baseNingizimu

src_text: Afrika bonkana bazosala bezikhotha amanxeba becabanga ngemisebenzi yalesi sibenzi sabantu ebesizibophezele ngaso sonke isikhathi ukwakha iNingizimu Afrika engcono kwaze kuba kufika usuku lwaso lokwedlula emhlabenNjengeLungu Lekhabhinethi, umufi ongasekho uNgqongqoshe Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni Nokuphathwa Kwayo uzofihlwa Ngokohlelo Lomngcwabo Kahulumeni Osemthethweni Olungumkhakha 1.
trg_text: Government and the people of South Africa will solely miss the contribution from this servant of the people who remained committed to building a better South Africa until deatAs a member of the Executive, the late Public Service and Administration Minister will be afforded an Official Funeral Category 1.

src_text: Inkonzo yomngcwabo iyoba ngoMgqibelo mhla zingama-21 Ndasa 2015 esigodini saseXikundu eMalamulele, esifundazweni saseLimpop IKhabhinethi yedlulisa ukudabuka kwayo kwimindeni nakubangani bakaNgqongqoshe ongasekho kanye nakweyabaqaphi bakhe ababili Ukuqaliswa kokusebenza Kwezinhlelo
trg_text: The funeral service will take place on Saturday, 21 March 2015 at Xikundu village in Malamulele, Limpop Cabinet conveys its sincerest condolences to the families and friends of the late Minister and his two protectors Implementation of key government programmes President Jacob Zuma will lead the 50th anniversary celebrations of South Africa s nuclear research reactor SAFARI-1 operated by

src_text: Zikahulumeni Ezisemqoka UMongameli uJacob Zuma uzohola imigubho yama-50 yokuthokozela ucwaningo lwesiphehli senuzi okuyi-SAFARI-1 nesingaphansi Komlawuli Wamandla Kazwelonke waseNingizimu Afrika (i-NERSA) ePelindaba eduze kwasePitol Kusukela selokhu sanikwa ilungelo lokusebenza ngomhla ziyi-18 Ndasa 1965, lesi siphehli, nesingumkhiqizi omkhulu wama-isotopes asetshenziswa kwezokwelapha kanye nasezimbonini kuleli ngisho nasemazweni aphesheya, sesithole ukunconywa okukhulu kanye nokuchonywa uphaphe lwegwalagwala yizinhlaka zamazwe omhlab Lesi siphehli sesidlale indima ebaluleke kakhulu ocwaningweni lwenuzi, ekuthuthukisweni kanye nasekufundiseni ngayo futhi sesibeke iNingizimu Afrika ekhaleni lokuqhuba umkhankaso wezesayens IKhabhinethi imema bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi baqoke abantu abafanele ukuthi babamele Kwikhomishani Yokuklama yeLizwe Lonkengaphambi kosuku lokuvala okungumhla ziyi-10 Mbasa 2015.
trg_text: the National Energy Regulator of South Africa (NERSA) at Pelindaba near Pretori Since its commissioning on 18 March 1965, the reactor, which is a major producer of medical and industrial isotopes for both domestic and international consumption, received many accolades and international accreditatio This reactor has also played a critical role in nuclear research, development and education and has placed South Africa in the forefront of scientific advance Cabinet calls on South Africans to nominate suitable individuals to serve on the National Planning Commission before the closing date of 10 April 2015.

src_text: Le khomishani entsha izogxila kakhulu ekwelulekeni uhulumeni ukuthi angakwazi kanjani ukwenza ukuthi Uhlelo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezwe (i-NDP) lusebenz Ngaphezu kwalokho, le khomishani izophinda futhi isize ekuthuthukiseni izinhlelo ezinqala emikhakheni ekhethekile edinga ukunakwa ukuze kukhuliswe umnotho, kube noshintsho olubambekayo kwezomnotho kanye nentuthuko eqhubekay Ukuthola ulwazi olwengeziwe mayelana nohlelo lokuqoka abantu ungangena kulesi sizindalwazi: wwthepresidencgoza3.
trg_text: The focus of the new commission will be on advising government on how best to implement the National Development Pla In addition it will also assist in developing detailed plans in selected sectors that require focussed attention to drive economic growth, radical economic transformation and sustainable developmen More information on the nomination process is available on: wwthepresidencgoza3.

src_text: Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi Eziqavile IKhabhinethi iye yaphasisa ukulethwa Kwezichibiyelo kuMthetho Wase-Rome Wenkantolo Yobugebengu Yamazwe Omhlaba (i-ICC) ukuze zigunyazw Lezi zichibiyelo zifaka phakathi ukuchazwa kwamacala obudlova kanye nezenzo ezingabizwa ngokuthi zingamacala empi kuMthetho Wase-Rome nowemukelwe Yisigungu Samaqembu Ombuso (e-Kampala, ezweni lase-Uganda mhla ziyi-11 Nhlangulana 2010).Ukugunyazwa kwalezi zichibiyelo kuMthetho Wase-Rome kwenziwa yiNingizimu Afrika kubonisa ukuzibophezela kukahulumeni wakuleli ukulwisana namacala abucayi enziwe kubantu kanye namacala obudlova uma enziwe ngaphakathi kwezwe lethu noma ngaphandle kwal 4.
trg_text: Key Cabinet decisions Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament the Amendments to the Rome Statute of the International Criminal Court for ratificatio The amendments include the definition of crimes of aggression and additional acts constituting the war crimes in the Rome Statute adopted by the Assembly of State Parties (in Kampala, Uganda on 11 June 2010).Ratification of these amendments to the Rome Statute by South Africa demonstrates government s commitment to fight serious crimes against humanity and crime of aggression when committed in or outside our countr 4.

src_text: Isimo seKhabhinethi ezindabeni ezisematheni IKhabhinethi iziqaphele izingxoxo ezikhona mayelana nesigamu sakamuva semingcele ehlongozwaywo futhi iyakwazisa ukuthi izingxoxo eziphusile ziyinto esenhliziyweni yentando yethu yening Njengoba kukhona omasipala abatabalasayo ukuletha izidingo kubantu futhi uthole ukuthi bayantengantenga ngenxa yezimali ezingenele kanye nokungabuswa ngendlela, imingcele yomasipala iyaye ihlale ihlale ibuye ibuyekezwLezi zinguquko ezihlongozwaywo ziyaye ziqale zibukisiswe kahle Yibhodi Eliklama Imingcele Yomasipala (i-MDB), nokuyisikhungo esethweswe umsebenzi wokwenza imingcele yomasipala ngokusho Kukahulumeni Wendawo: uMthetho Wokukalwa Kwemingcele Yomasipala, 1998 (uMthetho 27 we-1998) kanye noMthethosisekelo WaseRiphabhlikhi YaseNingizimu Afrika we-1996.
trg_text: Cabinet s position on current issues Cabinet notes the responses to the latest round of proposed demarcations and acknowledges that robust debate is an integral part of our democrac Since there are some municipalities that are struggling to deliver services and remain unsustainable due to insufficient revenue and inadequate governance, municipal boundaries are constantly revieweThe proposed changes are first scrutinised by the Municipal Demarcation Board (MDB), which is charged with determining municipal boundaries in accordance with the Local Government: Municipal Demarcation Act, 1998 (Act 27 of 1998) and the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996.

src_text: Njengesikhungo esizimele, zonke izinhlelo ze-MDB zenziwa obala futhi kuyaboniswana nangaz IKhabhinethi, ikhuthaza imiphakathi ukuthi ibambe iqhaza elibonakalayo kulezi zinhlel IKhabhinethi iyasigxeka isenzo sokusetshenziswa kwezimashi ezinodlame njengendlela yokusombulula ukungaboni ngasolinye ngodaba lwemingcel Umsebenzi we-MDB uyingxenye ebalulekile yomsebenzi kahulumeni wokuthi Azibuyele Emasisweni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi imiphakathi inikwa izidingo ezingcono neziwufanel IKhabhinethi ihalalisela abantu baseLesotho ngokuba nokhetho olunokuthula nolungenazihibe futhi ibakhuthazile ukuthi basebenzisane ukuze kube nokuthula okungapheli kanye nokuthuthuka kwezomnoth IKhabhinethi futhi ihalalisela uNdunankulu omusha wezwe laseLesotho, uMhlonishwa uPakalitha Mosisili ngokuqokwa kwakhe kanye nangokubekwa kwakhe esihlalweni ngempumelelo okwenzeka ngoLwesibili mhla ziyi-17 Ndasa 2015, kanti lowo mcimbi wawuhanjelwe nanguMhlonishwa uMongameli uJacob Zuma kanye nePhini LikaMongameli uCyril RamaphosIKhabhinethi ibuye yahalalisela iPhini LikaMongameli ngendima elayidlala neyaholela ekutheni kube nokhetho oluyimpumelelo eLesoth
trg_text: These events will provide a platform for all South Africans to commemorate the sacrifices that accompanied the struggle for democracy and our commitment to advance human rights as enshrined in the ConstitutioCabinet calls on all South Africans to celebrate this important day by fostering greater social cohesion and nation-buildin As part of Human Rights Month, community dialogues will take place across all provinces to promote interaction among communities of different background This will culminate in the National Social Cohesion Report-back and Monitoring Summit to be held on 30 March 2015 in Port Elizabet The Department of Social Development will host the National Social Work Indaba from 24 to 26 March 2015 at the International Convention Centre in Durban under the theme:

src_text: IKhabhinethi yaphinda futhi yancoma indima eyadlalwa yiNhlangano Ethuthukisa Amazwe aseNingizimu ne-Afrika (i-SADC) ekwenzeni ukuthi kube nokuthula nozinzo kanye nokukhethwa kohulumeni omusha kuleliya lizw IKhabhinethi yaphinda yakubeka kwacaca ukuzibophezela kweNingizimu Afrika ukuqhubeka nokusebenzisana nezwe laseLesotho ukuqhubeka nokukhulisa amaxhama okuxhumana ngokugxila kakhulu ekuqiniseni ezomnotho kanye nokubambisana kwezenhlalo nokuyoholela ekwenzeni ngcono izimpilo zabantu Imicimbi ezayo IPhini likaMongameli uRamaphosa uzohambela Usuku Lokugujwa Kwenkululeko Yama-25 e-Namibia, kuhlanganisa nokubekwa ngokusemthethweni kukaMongameli u-Hage Geingob e-Windhoek ngomhla zingama-21 Ndasa 2015.
trg_text: President Zuma will open the Black Industrialists Indaba taking place from 25 to 26 March 2015 at Gallagher Convention Centre, Midrand, as part of government s commitment to develop black industrialists in the countr The Indaba will foster dialogue between the public and private sector to advance black industrialists, and to radically transform and restructure the economy to achieve inclusive growt President Zuma will address the National Members Assembly (NMA) of the South African Local Government Association, which will take place at Gallagher Convention Centre, Midrand from 24 to 26 March 2015.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ithanda ukuhalalisela izwe lase-Namibia ngokugubha lolu suku osekuyi-Silver Jubilee futhi iphinde ihalalisele noMongameli Geingob ngokuqokwa kwakhe ukuthi abe nguMongameli wesithathu kuleliya lizw
trg_text: Cabinet commends Namibia on its Silver Jubilee celebrations and President Geingob on becoming the country s third Head of Stat

src_text: UMongameli uZuma uzovakashelwa nguMongameli waseZimbabwe uMongameli uRobert Mugabe kusukela ngomhla ziyisi-8 kuya kumhla ziyisi-9 Mbasa 2015 ePitol Lokhu kuvakasha kuyoholela ekutheni kube Nesithangami Sabamabhizinisi Phakathi KweNingizimu Afrika NeZimbabwe okuhlelwe ukuthi sibe ngomhla ziyisi-9 Mbasa 2015, nokuhloswe ngaso ukukhulisa amaxhama okuxhumana kwezohwebo kanye nezokutshalwa kwezimali phakathi kwalawa mazwe womabil UMongameli uZuma kuzothi ngomhla ziyi-19 Ndasa 2015 ethule izitimela ezingama-95 ePitoli nezakhiwe njengengxenye yohlelo lweTransnet lokutshala imali eyizigidigii zamarandi ezingama-300 ukulungisa kabusha ingqalasizinda kwimboni yezokuthwala impahla kulel Kulesi sikhathi sokutshalwa kwemali kuzokwakhiwa inqwaba yamathuba emisebenzi emisha kanti namabhizinisi endawo azozuza ngokuthi kwenziwe imisebenzi endaweni, kube nokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono kanye nokwedluliselwa kwezobuchwepheshLezi zitimela ezintsha zizosiza ukulwa nokusalela emuva embonini yezitimela futhi zizokwenza ukuthi ukukhiqiza kube ngcono kulo mkhakha futhi kwenze nokuthi izitimela zethu zisebenze ngendlel Lokhu kwethulwa futhi kuzobonisa ukushintshwa Kwezobunjiniyela KwaTransnet ukuze ibe ngumsunguli ophelele ngokugcwele ngoba izitimela ezingama-85 kulezi zakhiqizwa kwisikhungo esise-Koedoespoort, eduze kwasePitol
trg_text: President Zuma will host Zimbabwe s President Robert Mugabe from 8 to 9 April 2015 in Pretori The visit will culminate into the South Africa-Zimbabwe Business Forum scheduled for 9 April 2015, which aims to increase bilateral trade and investmen President Zuma will on 19 March 2015 launch 95 locomotives in Pretoria that have been built as part of Transnet s R300 billion capital investment programme to revitalise the country s freight infrastructur Over the duration of the investment programme a number of new jobs will be created and local businesses stand to benefit from localisation, skills development and technology transfeThe new trains will address the country s rail system backlog and will help improve the productivity and efficiency of our rail networ The launch also signals the transformation of Transnet Engineering into a fully-fledged original equipment manufacturer as 85 of the trains were produced at its facility at Koedoespoort, near Pretori

src_text: UMongameli uZuma uzovula Umhlangano Wabaphathi Bokwenza Impahla Abamnyama nozokwenzeka kusukela mhla zingama-25 kuya kumhla zingama-26 Ndasa 2015 e-Gallagher Convention Centre, e-Midrand, njengengxenye yokuzibophezela kukahulumeni ekuthuthukiseni abaphathi bokwenza impahla abamnyama kuleli lizw Lo mhlangano uzokwenza ukuthi kube nezinkulumo-ngxoxo phakathi komkhakha kahulumeni kanye nomkhakha ozimele ukuthuthukisa abaphathi bokwenza impahla abamnyama, kanye nokuhlela umnotho ngesivinini nangamandla ukuze kungabibikho oshiywa ngaphandle uma kukhuliswa umnoth UMongameli uZuma uzokwethula inkulumo Kumalungu Endlu YesiShayamthetho Kazwelonke (i-NMA) Yenhlangano Yohulumeni Basekhaya YaseNingizimu Afrika, kanti lokhu kuyokwenzeka e-Gallagher Convention Centre, e-Midrand kusukela ngomhla zingama-24 kuya kumhla zingama-26 Ndasa 2015.
trg_text: Revitalising social work practice in South Africa .The Indaba will develop proposals and interventions to address matters that impact on the social work practice and align the development mandate of the profession to support government s radical socio-economic transformatio To accomplish this, the department has rolled out a scholarship programme to fund students studying social work at universitie The Department of Social Development will also hold the 2nd Anti-Fraud and Corruption Conference from 30 to 31 March 2015 at St George s Hotel, Centurion under the theme:

src_text: I-NMA izoveza isithombe ngohulumeni bezindawo ngemuva kweminyaka eyi-15 bese kukhulunywa nangamacebo okubhekana ngqo nokulethwa kwezidingo kubantu, ukufukula omasipala, ukulwa nenkohlakalo kanye nezindaba ezithinta imingcele yomasipal Lo mbuthano uzobanjwa ngaphansi kwesihloko esithi: Iminyaka eyi-15 Yohulumeni Bezindawo Abanentando Yeningi
trg_text: The NMA will reflect on the state of local government after 15 years and discuss strategies to deal effectively with service delivery, capacity building, corruption and issues around the demarcation of municipalitie The Assembly will be held under the theme:

src_text: Ukuqinisa kanye Nokuzinzisa Intando Yeningi Enomfutho, Ethuthukisayo Nesondelene Nabantu .
trg_text: Consolidating and Deepening Vibrant, Developmental and People Centered Local Democracy .

src_text: Le mibhiyozo izohlinzeka ngendawo kubantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi bakwazi ukukhumbula ukuzinikela okwakuphelezela umzabalazo ukuqhubekisela phambili amalungelo oluntu njengalokhu ebalulwe kuMthethosisekelIKhabhinethi imema bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi baluthokozele lolu suku olubaluleke kangaka ngokuthi babe nokubambana njengomphakathi futhi kwakhiwe isizw Njengengxenye Yenyanga Yamalungelo Oluntu, kuyoba nezinkulumo-mpikiswano emiphakathini kuzona zonke izifundazwe ukukhuthaza ukuxhumana phakathi kwemiphakathi ephila nekhule ezindaweni ezahluken Lokhu kuyobe sekuholela ekutheni kube Nomhlangano Kazwelonke Wokuzobika kanye Nokubheka Ukuxhumana Komphakathi noyobanjwa mhla zingama-30 Ndasa 2015 eBhay UMnyango Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi uzobamba Ingqungquthela Kazwelonke Yosonhlalakahle kusukela mhla zingama-24 kuya kumhla zingama-26 Ndasa 2015 e-International Convention Centre e-Durban ngaphansi kwesihloko esithi:
trg_text: Cabinet, encourages communities to actively participate in these processe Cabinet condemns the usage of violent protest marches as a means of resolving demarcation dispute The work of the MDB is an integral part of government s Back to Basics approach to ensure better delivery of services to communitie Cabinet congratulates the Basotho people for a smooth transfer of power and has urged them to work together for lasting peace and economic developmen Cabinet also congratulated the new Prime Minister of the Kingdom of Lesotho, Right Honourable Pakalitha Mosisili on his election and successful inauguration that took place on Tuesday, 17 March 2015, which was attended by His Excellency President Jacob Zuma and Deputy President Cyril RamaphosCabinet congratulated the Deputy President on the role he played leading to the successful elections in the Kingdom of Lesoth

src_text: Ukunika amandla umsebenzi wokuba ngusonhlalakahle eNingizimu Afrika .Le ngqungquthela iyosungula izincomo kanye nezinhlaka zokungenelela ukubhekana nezindaba ezithikameza umsebenzi wokuba ngusonhlalakahle bese wenza ukuthi ukuthuthukiswa kwalo msebenzi kuhambisane namandla anikwe lomsebenzi okuwukweseka izinhlelo zikahulumeni zokushintsha izimpio zabantu ngokwenhlalo kanye nangokomnoth Ukuze kuphunyeleliswe lokhu, lo Mnyango usuvele unohlelo lwemifundaze wokuxhasa abafundi abenza izifundo zokuba ngosonhlalakahle emanyunives UMnyango Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi uzobamba Ingqunguthela Yawo Yesibili Yokulwa Nenkohlakalo kanye Nokukhwabanisa kusukela mhla zingama-30 kuya kumhla zingama-31 Ndasa 2015 e-St George s Hotel, e-Centurion ngaphansi kwesihloko esithi:
trg_text: continue working with the Kingdom of Lesotho to further enhance the existing relations by focusing on strengthening economic and social cooperation that will lead to the improvement of people s lives Upcoming events Deputy President Ramaphosa will attend the Republic of Namibia s 25th Independence Anniversary, including the Inauguration of President Hage Geingob in Windhoek on 21 March 2015.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iyakwemukela ukuzobanjwa komqhudelwano wokuqala ngqa we-basketball Wezizwe Ezine ozobanjelwa Enkundleni yase-Wembley, eGoli kusukela ngomhla ziyi-19 kuya kumhla zingama-22 Ndasa 2015.

src_text: Lokhu kuzoletha amaqembu amakhulu abesilisa aseNingizimu Afrika, elase-Nigeria, elase-Mozambique kanye nelase-Kenya ndawonye kulo mqhudelwano esibona sengathi uzoba umcimbi wonyak.
trg_text: This brings the senior men s teams of South Africa, Nigeria, Mozambique and Kenya together in what is envisaged to become an annual even.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ihalalisela iqembu lethu lekhilikithi, eseledlulele emzuliswaneni olandelayo ngokuwina ngamawikhethi ayisishiyagalolunye kwi-Sri Lanka Kwindebe Yomhlab Sifisela iqembu kanye nomqeqeshi walo okuhle kodwa njengoba bezobe beqhubeka nomqhudelwano AbaqashiweBonke laba abaqashiwe ukuqashwa kwabo kuyoqinisekiswa mhla izicucu zokuqashwa kwabo kanye noqinisekiswa kokufaneleka kwabo okufanele lezi zikhundla kwavunyw Isigungu Sezamanzi: Adv Tintswalo Annah Nana Makhubele (uSihlalo) Nksz Lindelwa Mbanjwa (iPhini likaSihlalo) Mnu Pumezo Malik Mpumelelo Jonas Nksz Maleho Margaret Nkomo Slz Tumai Murombo, kanye no Mnu Ferdinand Zondagh Isigungu Sokulawulwa Kwezinhlalo Nezindlu Ahmed Essop Vawda (uSihlalo futhi oqashwe kabusha) Shadrack Kabelo Ganda Itumeleng William Kotsoane Kelikile Elva Kwinana Maphuti Justine Lamola (oqashwe kabusha) Nontutuzelo Nomtandazo Mbiza (oqashwe kabusha) Mandla Mdludlu Rose Sessie Molokoane Manye Richard Moroka Zolile Thando Ngcakani Zikiswa Zandile Ntlangula, kanye no Phakamile Worrel Weekes Ximiya Isikhungo Sikazwelonke Sezokuxhumana Nge-elekhronikhi eNingizimu Afrika (i-NEMISA)Ukuqokwa kabusha Kwabaqondisi Abangeyona Ingxenye Yesigungu Esiphezulu
